item.description:
Come join the NEBR and the Barefoot Runner's Society MA Chapter for a 3-5 mile run along the Charles River on a very smooth asphalt surface from the Hatch Shell to and over the Mass Ave Bridge into Cambridge and back with experienced and new minimalist and barefoot runners running at an average pace. Guaranteed to be fun.

Optional Back Bay Dinner after the run. Bring $ in pocket.

There will be a quick 10 minute mini workshop on barefoot running technique and the minimalist transition and the barefoot advantage.

This is FREE and all are welcome to attend.
item.how_to_find_us: Barefoot Runners near the Hatch Shell on the river side.
item.name: Charles River/Back Bay Esplanade Fun Run, Boston, MA
